name: Rikti_Data
display_help: Draws forth an essence of a vanquished Headman from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes.

name: Robotic_Drones_Core_Data
display_help: Draws forth an essence of a vanquished Assault Drone from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes.

name: Polar_Lights_Radial_Data
display_help: Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Borealis and Australis from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes.
display_short_help: Summon Polar Lights LT & Support Essences

name: Cimeroran_Total_Core_Improved_Data
display_help:
Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Cimeroran Praefectus Castorum and Centurion from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)

name: IDF_Partial_Core_Improved_Data
display_help:
Draws forth the essences of a vanquished IDF Commander and Battle Orb from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)

name: Clockwork_Partial_Radial_Improved_Data
display_help:
Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Clockwork Mender and Builder from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes. This Mender is capable of attacking as well as support.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)

name: Vanguard_Total_Radial_Improved_Data
display_help:
Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Vanguard Magician and Sergeant from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes. The Magician is untouchable, but has no offensive powers at all.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)

name: Longbow_Core_Superior_Data
display_help:
Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Longbow Cataphract and Nullifier from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes. These essences do increased damage compared to their previous versions.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)

name: Arachnos_Radial_Superior_Data
display_help:
Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Arachnos Toxic Tarantula from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 3 minutes and 20 seconds and a Fortunata from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes. The Fortunata is untouchable, but has no offensive powers at all.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)

name: Frigid_Storm
display_help: All foes that pass through this storm will be shredded with shards of falling death energy, suffering cold and negative energy damage over time. Additionally, damage is reduced on all opponents within the storm.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Minor DoT(Cold/Negative Energy), -DMG(Foe, All)
display_target_help: You are caught in a frigid storm and will suffer cold and negative energy damage continuously while you remain within it, in addition to reduced damage potential. Leave the storm's field to eliminate the damage and debuff.

messages.display_victim_hit: The {PlayerSource} chills you for {Damage} points of cold damage and lowers your damage output!
The {PlayerSource} drains you for {Damage} points of negative energy damage!

Targeted Wide AoE League Teleport, +Healing Received, +Stealth, +Perception Radius, +Move Speed. Foe Knockback, Stun. This power will prompt teammates to accept it if they have enabled Prompt Team Teleport. Recharge: Very Long.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)
display_short_help: Targeted Wide AoE League Teleport, +Healing Received, +Stealth, +Perception Radius, +Move Speed. Foe Knockback, Stun.
display_confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Teleport you. Do you Accept?

name: Ageless_Fate
display_help: PBAoE Ally +End, +Recharge Rate. Recharge: Very Long. The continuing buffs from this power will gradually lose effectiveness over time before they expire completely after 60 seconds.

name: Ageless_Core_Fate
display_help: PBAoE Ally +End, +Recharge Rate, +Recovery. Recharge: Very Long. The continuing buffs from this power will gradually lose effectiveness over time before they expire completely after 60 seconds.

name: Ageless_Radial_Fate
display_help: PBAoE Ally +End, +Recharge Rate, +Debuff Resistance. Recharge: Very Long. The continuing buffs from this power will gradually lose effectiveness over time before they expire completely after 60 seconds.

name: Rebirth_Total_Core_Fate
display_help:
Wide PBAoE Ally Heal, +Max HP. Recharge: Very Long. The continuing buffs from this power will gradually lose effectiveness over time before they expire completely after 60 seconds.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)

name: Rebirth_Partial_Core_Fate
display_help:
PBAoE Ally Heal, +Max HP. Recharge: Very Long. The continuing buffs from this power will gradually lose effectiveness over time before they expire completely after 90 seconds.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)

name: Barrier_Partial_Radial_Fate
display_help:
PBAoE Ally +DEF(All), +Res(All), Ally Rez x1. Recharge: Very Long. This power will attempt to revive up to one defeated ally. The continuing buffs from this power will gradually lose effectiveness over time before they expire completely after 90 seconds.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)

name: Barrier_Total_Radial_Fate
display_help:
PBAoE Ally +DEF(All), +Res(All), Ally Rez x2. Recharge: Very Long. This power will attempt to revive up to two defeated allies. The continuing buffs from this power will gradually lose effectiveness over time before they expire completely after 60 seconds.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)

name: Clarion_Core_Fortune
display_help:
Wide PBAoE Ally Status Effect Protection. Recharge: Very Long. The continuing buffs from this power will gradually lose effectiveness over time before they expire completely after 120 seconds, but more of the power's strength will last the full duration.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)
display_short_help: Wide PBAoE Ally Status Effect Protection

name: Clarion_Radial_Fortune
display_help:
Wide PBAoE Ally Status Effect Protection, +Range, and secondary effect boost. Recharge: Very Long. The continuing buffs from this power will gradually lose effectiveness over time before they expire completely after 90 seconds.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)
display_short_help: Wide PBAoE Ally Status Effect Protection, +Range, +Special

name: Assault_Genome
display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a 20% chance to boost your own damage for a short period of time. This boost can stack up to 3 times. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Assault_Core_Genome
display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a 35% chance to boost your own damage for a short period of time. This boost can stack up to 3 times. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Core Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Assault_Radial_Genome
display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a low chance to strike again for a moderate portion of their damage in Smashing damage. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Radial Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Assault_Total_Core_Graft
display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a 55% chance to boost your own damage for a short period of time. This boost can stack up to 3 times. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Total Core Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Assault_Partial_Core_Graft
display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a 40% chance to boost your damage for a short period of time. This boost can stack up to 3 times. This power gives also gives all of your damaging powers a moderate chance to strike again for a small portion of their damage in Smashing damage. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Partial Core Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for +DMG(All), Chance for Doublehit

name: Assault_Partial_Radial_Graft
display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a 30% chance to boost your damage for a short period of time. This boost can stack up to 3 times. This power gives also gives all of your damaging powers a moderate chance to strike again for a moderate portion of their damage in Smashing damage. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Partial Radial Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for +DMG(All), Chance for Doublehit

name: Assault_Total_Radial_Graft
display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a high chance to strike again for a moderate portion of their damage in Energy damage. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Total Radial Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Assault_Core_Embodiment
display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a 65% chance to boost your own damage for a short period of time. This boost can stack up to 5 times. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Core Embodiment is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Assault_Radial_Embodiment
display_help: While active, this power gives all of your damaging powers a very high chance to strike again for a large portion of their damage in Energy damage. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Damage at all times. Note that Assault Radial Embodiment is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Control_Genome
display_help: Toggle: Chance for Lethal damage to Controlled enemies. This ability gives a 10% chance for its effects to occur when their conditions are met. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Control_Core_Genome
display_help: Toggle: Chance for +1 Mag to Controls, Chance for Lethal damage to Controlled enemies. This ability gives a 20% chance for its effects to occur when their conditions are met. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Core Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Lethal Damage (Special), Chance for +1 Magnitude

name: Control_Radial_Genome
display_help: Toggle: Adds a Chance for Fear to most damaging powers. This ability gives a 35% chance for its effects to occur on each hit. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Radial Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Control_Total_Core_Graft
display_help: Toggle: Chance for +1 Mag to Controls, Chance for Lethal damage to Controlled enemies. This ability gives a 50% chance for its effects to occur when their conditions are met. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Total Core Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Lethal Damage (Special), Chance for +1 Magnitude

name: Control_Partial_Core_Graft
display_help: Toggle: Chance for +1 Mag to Controls, Chance for Psionic damage to Controlled enemies. This ability gives a 35% chance for its effects to occur when their conditions are met. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Partial Core Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Psionic Damage (Special), Chance for +1 Magnitude

name: Control_Partial_Radial_Graft
display_help: Toggle: Adds a Chance for Fear to most damaging powers. This ability gives a 45% chance for its effects to occur on each hit. Also adds a chance for +1 magnitude to all of your status effects while active. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Partial Radial Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Fear, Chance for +1 Magnitude to Crowd Control effects

name: Control_Total_Radial_Graft
display_help: Toggle: Adds a Chance for Fear and a Chance for Immobilize to most damaging powers. This ability gives a 45% chance for its effects to occur on each hit. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Total Radial Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Fear, Chance for Immobilize (Special)

name: Control_Core_Embodiment
display_help: Toggle: Chance for +1 Mag to Controls, Chance for Psionic damage to Controlled enemies. This ability gives a 75% chance for its effects to occur when their conditions are met. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Core Embodiment is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Psionic Damage (Special), Chance for +1 Magnitude

name: Control_Radial_Embodiment
display_help: Toggle: Adds a Chance for Fear and a Chance for Immobilize to most damaging powers. This ability gives a 70% chance for its effects to occur on each hit. If your target is already Immobilized and Feared, you have an additional 100% chance to stun that target. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Status Resistance at all times. Note that Control Radial Embodiment is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Chance for Fear, Chance for Immobilize, Chance for Stun (Special)

name: Melee_Genome_1
display_help: This power grants the user a stacking Regeneration buff for each enemy within an 8 foot radius. The effect reaches its maximum strength at 4 enemies. This power also grants some Regeneration with no enemies in range. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Regeneration at all times. Note that Melee Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Melee_Genome_2
display_help: This power grants the user a stacking Regeneration and Resistance buff for each enemy within an 8 foot radius. The effect reaches its maximum strength at 4 enemies. This power also grants a small amount of Regeneration and Resistance even with no foes in range. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Regeneration at all times. Note that Melee Core Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Melee_Genome_3
display_help: This power grants the user a stacking Regeneration and Defense buff for each enemy within an 8 foot radius. The effect reaches its maximum strength at 4 enemies - these enemies will be taunted by this power. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Regeneration at all times. Note that Melee Radial Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Melee_Genome_4
display_help: This power grants the user a stacking Regeneration, Resistance, and Status Protection buff for each enemy within an 8 foot radius. The effect reaches its maximum strength at 4 enemies. This power also grants a moderate Regeneration, Resistance, and Status Protection buff regardless of nearby foes. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Regeneration at all times. Note that Melee Total Core Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Regen,+Res(All), +Status Protection(All) per nearby enemy

name: Melee_Genome_5
display_help: This power grants the user a stacking Regeneration and Resistance buff for each enemy within an 8 foot radius. The effect reaches its maximum strength at 7 enemies. This power also grants a large Regeneration and Resistance buff regardless of nearby foes. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Regeneration at all times. Note that Melee Partial Core Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Melee_Genome_6
display_help: This power grants the user a stacking Regeneration and Defense buff for each enemy within an 8 foot radius. The effect reaches its maximum strength at 7 enemies - these enemies will be taunted by this power. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Regeneration at all times. Note that Melee Partial Radial Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Melee_Genome_7
display_help: This power grants the user a stacking Regeneration, Defense, and Status Protection buff for each enemy within an 8 foot radius. The effect reaches its maximum strength at 4 enemies - these enemies will be taunted by this power. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Regeneration at all times. Note that Melee Total Radial Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Regeneration, +Defense(All), +Status Protection per nearby enemy

name: Melee_Genome_8
display_help: This power grants the user a stacking Regeneration, Resistance, and Status Protection buff for each enemy within a 10 foot radius. The effect reaches its maximum strength at 9 enemies. This power also grants a very large Regeneration, Resistance, and Status Protection buff regardless of nearby foes. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Regeneration at all times. Note that Melee Core Embodiment is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Regen, +Resist(All), +Status Protection per nearby enemy

name: Melee_Genome_9
display_help: This power grants the user a stacking Regeneration, Defense, and Status Protection buff for each enemy within a 10 foot radius. The effect reaches its maximum strength at 9 enemies - these enemies will be taunted by this power. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Regeneration at all times. Note that Melee Radial Embodiment is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Regen, +Defense(All), +Status Protection per nearby enemy

name: Support_Genome
display_help: While toggled on, this power provides a small boost in Damage(All) and Defense(Melee, Smashing, Lethal) to all leaguemates within a 50 foot radius. Up to five Support Hybrid powers can stack on a single target at any given time. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Endurance Discount at all times. Note that Support Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Support_Genome_2
display_help: While toggled on, this power provides a small boost in Damage(All) and Defense(Melee, AoE, Smashing, Lethal, Energy, Negative) to all leaguemates within a 50 foot radius. Up to five Support Hybrid powers can stack on a single target at any given time. This boost is doubled in strength for pets. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Endurance Discount at all times. Note that Support Core Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Support_Genome_3
display_help: While toggled on, this power provides a small boost in Damage(All), Accuracy, and Defense(Melee, AoE, Smashing, Lethal, Energy, Negative) to all leaguemates within a 50 foot radius. Up to five Support Hybrid powers can stack on a single target at any given time. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Endurance Discount at all times. Note that Support Radial Genome is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Support_Genome_4
display_help: While toggled on, this power provides a small boost in Damage, Accuracy, and Defense(Melee, AoE, Smashing, Lethal, Energy, Negative, Fire, Cold) to all leaguemates within a 50 foot radius. Up to five Support Hybrid powers can stack on a single target at any given time. This boost is doubled in strength for pets. Equipping this Hybrid power grants a passive boost to Endurance Discount at all times. Note that Support Total Core Graft is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Long

name: Support_Genome_5
display_help: While toggled on, this power provides a small boost in Damage, Defense(Melee, AoE, Smashing, Lethal, Energy, Negative, Fire, Cold), and Special to all leaguemates within a 50 foot radius. Up to five Support Hybrid powers can stack on a single target at any given time. This boost is doubled in strength for pets. name: Support_Genome_6
display_help: While toggled on, this power provides a small boost in Damage, Accuracy, and Defense(Melee, AoE, Smashing, Lethal, Energy, Negative, Fire, Cold) to all leaguemates within a 50 foot radius. name: Arachnos_Ally
display_help: Draws forth an essence of a vanquished Arachnos Bane Spider from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes. Note that Arachnos Ally is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Very Long

name: Arachnos_Core_Ally
display_help: Draws forth an essence of a vanquished Arachnos Toxic Tarantula from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes. Note that Arachnos Core Ally is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Very Long

name: Arachnos_Radial_Ally
display_help: Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Arachnos Fortunata and Bane Spider from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes. Note that Arachnos Radial Ally is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Very Long

name: Arachnos_Total_Core_Improved_Ally
display_help:
Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Arachnos Toxic Tarantula and Bane Spider from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.). Note that Arachnos Total Core Improved Ally is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Very Long

name: Arachnos_Partial_Core_Improved_Ally
display_help:
Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Arachnos Toxic Tarantula and Fortunata from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.). Note that Arachnos Partial Core Improved Ally is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Very Long

name: Arachnos_Partial_Radial_Improved_Ally
display_help:
Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Arachnos Fortunata and Bane Spider from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes. This Fortunata is capable of attacking as well as support.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.). Note that Arachnos Partial Radial Improved Ally is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Very Long

name: Arachnos_Total_Radial_Improved_Ally
display_help:
Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Arachnos Fortunata and Bane Spider from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes. The Fortunata is untouchable, but has no offensive powers at all.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.). Note that Arachnos Total Radial Improved Ally is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Very Long

name: Arachnos_Core_Superior_Ally
display_help:

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.). Note that Arachnos Core Superior Ally is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Very Long

display_help:

name: Vorpal_Radial_Final_Verdict
display_help: Self-Targeted Wide Cone AoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing), Self +Defense(All) Recharge: Very Long. This power does not require a target. When used, it will hit in a cone in front of the player, regardless of what entity is currently selected.

display_target_help: The Vorpal Judgement strikes with surreal precision, often causing lingering wounds, and the rapidity of motion can make the user harder to hit for a short time.
